title: Oodha Kalaru Lyrics Varuthapadatha Valibar Sangam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oodha Color Ribbon
Singer: Hariharasudhan
Movie: Varuthapadatha Vaalibar Sangam
Music: D Imman
Lyrics: Yugaparathi

Ooodha color-u ribbon
unnaku yaaru appan
ne solladi avanukku naan salaam podanum
ne solladi avanukku naan salaam podanum

Roja .... Roja..
Roja color-u bommy
unnaku yaaru mummy
ye nilladi avaluku naan sabaash podanum
ye nilladi avaluku naan sabaash podanum

Mathavanga nadandhu pona
veedhi verum veedhi
nee theruvil nadandhu pona enaku
seidhi thalaippu seidhi

mathavanga sirippa paarthaa
ok verum ok
nee sririchi pesum podhu
enakku vandhidudhe seekey

Mathavanga azhagu ellaam
mothathula oru bore-u
singaari un azhagu thaaney
bodha yethum beer-u beer-u
king fisher beer-u ..

Mathavanga orasi pona
jaali semma jaali
ne orasi pona piragupaartha
gaali I am gaali

Mathavanga kadandhu pona
thoosi verum thoosi
nee kadandhu pogum kulir-u
AC window AC..

Mathavanga kannukellaam
seemaati nee setta setta
ennaudaya kannuku nee
eppavumey kadhal kotta
nippatura paata

Ooodha ....Ooodha..
Ooodha color-u ribbon
unnaku yaaru appan (2)
ne solladi avanukku naan salaam podanum
ne solladi avanukku naan salaam podanum
